channel.title: Neal Mohan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Neal Mohan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: YouTube Commits $3M to Support L.A. Creative Professionals Impacted by L.A. Wildfires
item.description: News of the fund came Thursday via a blog post from YouTube’s vp of sales, Adam Stewart, who also confirmed that he lost a home in January’s wildfires.
